alert.note: Alert for Northern St. Tammany (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 1:54PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central St. Tammany Parish, west central Hancock and south central Pearl River Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 154 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pearl River, or 8 miles southwest of Picayune, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Picayune and Pearl River. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 59 in Louisiana between mile markers 5 and 11. Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
